item.title: Drainage and Sanitation
item.author: s.ghafoor@outlook.com (AbdulSayyed)
item.description: Level Basic Q-1 What is Sanitation and Drainage ?ยง Sanitation is the process where waste is either disposed hygienically or recycled while drainage can be natural or artificial process of removing water from a given area. When dealing with property sanitation and drainage, there exit different types of systems which ensures that strict policy and practices are followed for health and hygienic measures. Q-2 What are Above Ground Discharge Systems ?
